column1: Thank you for the outpouring of support yesterday. I found John’s own words from year ago about President George H. W. Bush. They are an anecdote for the last few days and I hope you’ll read them. https://t.co/4OENdHfdxs

So grateful to work with our friends at @MichiganLCV on clean air clean water and clean energy! We have a lot of work to do on environmental protections and organizations like the LCV are a crucial part of those efforts. https://t.co/y56JeybRvC

I have to go over 10 - there are thousands to thank! Female leaders across the 12th (and beyond) are making a difference every day & I’m grateful for their work; @BethBashert Brenda Sumbo Kyle Stack Pat Odette Mandy Grewal Kerreen Conley and many more!

#Thank10Women we work with so many women who care about their communities! @gretchenwhitmer @stabenow @ElissaSlotkin @RashidaTlaib @HaleyLive @RepLawrence @SenErikaGeiss @stephanielily @SenatorSantana @BettyJeanAlex @rebekahwarren @DonnaLasinski @kristypagan & Rep. Cara Clemente. https://t.co/FUoR25vGmp
Don’t forget to vote today Michigan! Polls are open until 8 p.m. Find out if your municipality has an election here: https://t.co/NEKeTgoNw6

Rest In Peace Elijah Cummings. He was one of the most decent human beings that walked the earth loved his country Baltimore & his family. He fought hard for democracy social justice civil rights the underdog and he never gave up. My heart goes out to his family & Maya. https://t.co/5FCWZWrWQp
Wishing you a speedy recovery @BernieSanders! John Dingell had a stent put in younger than you and continued holding people accountable for decades. I know you’ll be back at it soon!

Join me TOMORROW for a Medicare For All town hall with @PramilaJayapal. Rep. Jayapal and I led the introduction of the Medicare For All Act of 2019 which has now had three hearings in Congress and we want to answer your questions! RSVP here: https://t.co/WwzDHd8HUs https://t.co/HbfJgONNdG

The key to a vibrant democracy is ensuring everyone has a voice. For those eligible to vote it's a responsibility we all must take seriously.   Because of the hard work of @EmgageAction Southeast Michigan is leading the way in Muslim voter turnout.   https://t.co/Kb8dHnIrFZ

Those of you who knew John know that he loved military marches and Scottish bagpipes. But a Scottish sage wrote that “Death leaves a heartache that none can heal. Love leaves a memory that none can steal.”  More on Facebook: https://t.co/HOr1V6owmb
